info.+content: ブルーロック VS. U-20 JAPAN

Yoichi Isagi has made it to the next stage of Blue Lock with a handful of select players, but now it looks like their next test will be defending Blue Lock from getting shut down. With the legitimacy of Ego's training methods being questioned, a special match is being set up between Blue Lock's star players and U-20 Japan, with the future of Japanese soccer being put on the line. Isagi is still far off from the number one spot, but he is determined to adapt and find new chemical reactions that will allow him to steal the show.
"Boujaku no Charisma" by UNISON SQUARE GARDEN
TVアニメ『ブルーロック』公式サイト
